results.name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Silver Spring
results.description:
Situated in the heart of the Washington, DC metropolitan area, Home2 Suites by Hilton Silver Spring offers a convenient location close to the FDA, Adventist HealthCare White Oak Medical Center, the University of Maryland, National Archives at College Park and downtown Silver Spring. Downtown Washington DC and its world-famous attractions are also easily accessible, located 9 miles away. The Red Line Silver Spring metro station located 4 miles from the hotel allows you to travel around easily.

Settle in one of the modern studio or one-bedroom suites and enjoy free WiFi. A full kitchenette in each suite is perfect to make our Silver Spring hotel your home away from home. Our one-bedroom suites boast a separate living area, a private bedroom and two TVs for your convenience. Don't forget the leash, as Home2 is your pet's home, too.

results.name: Red Carpet Inn Takoma Park
results.description: Welcome to the Red Carpet Inn - Takoma Park, MD! A stay at this budget-friendly Takoma Park, MD hotel puts you just under 8 miles from downtown Washington D.C., and the countless historic attractions that chronicle the nation's past and present. The White House, the Jefferson Memorial, the Washington Monument and the Smithsonian Museum, among others, are all convenient to our location. If you're planning to visit the area for business, we are just over 11 miles from Reagan National Airport. To make your stay at our Takoma Park, MD hotel more pleasant and enjoyable, we offer complimentary on-site parking, with space for your RV, or commercial truck, if needed. We also accommodate buses, if needed. The friendly and courteous staff look forward to assisting you upon arrival. We offer complimentary coffee, 24 hours a day in our lobby. If you're looking for a quick snack or a drink, there are vending and ice machines conveniently located. Each of the guestrooms at this Takoma Park, MD hotel offers thoughtful touches. Amenities like a mini-refrigerator, hairdryer, iron and ironing board and flat panel television.
results.address: 7413 New Hampshire Ave, Takoma Park, MD 20912-6944

results.name: Red Carpet Inn University Of Maryland
results.description: Welcome to the Red Carpet Inn - University of Maryland! Enjoy a prime location near the University of Maryland, Howard University and Gallaudet University when staying at this College Park, MD hotel. We're also central to NASA Goddard Space Flight Center and the Washington Navy Yard. For air travelers, we are just 22 miles from Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport and 25 miles from BWI. The hotel is located directly off of the I-495 beltway, making checking in and exploring the city easy and convenient. Our location also puts you just 30 minutes north of the nation's capital, giving you access to all of the D.C. sights, from the Smithsonian Museums to the National Mall with its many monuments. You'll find the Red Carpet Inn is an easy stop, offering a great place to stay at a great rate. Our College Park, MD hotel features free, on-site parking and a 24 hour lobby, where you will find complimentary coffee served, 24 hours a day. Free wireless internet is provided throughout the hotel, allowing you to stay connected while on the road. Relax in one of our inviting guest rooms, all of which feature a comfortable workspace and flat-screen TV, offering premium channels. Every room comes equipped with a microwave and refrigerator, for added convenience and value during your stay.

results.name: Etta Mae Inn Bed and Breakfast
results.description: The Etta Mae Inn Bed & Breakfast is located in beautiful Victorian Takoma Park with easy access to metro, downtown Washington DC, Silver Spring, shopping, and good restaurants. 3 comfortable and cosy guest rooms feature generous amenities, warm inviting decor, antique furnishings and private bathrooms. Parlour with romantic fireplace, cosy reading room with library of books, TV and antique furniture, formal dining room with antique furniture, wrap around porch with ceiling fans and seating area, pergola with grape vines for outdoor seating, free off-street parking, sumptuous breakfast every morning, complimentary Wi-Fi in all areas, excellent location in Victorian Takoma Park and close to Silver Springs in the Washington DC area.

results.name: Hotel Silver Spring
results.description:
Enjoy a warm welcome and a great location at our hotel near Washington DC. Located in Silver Spring,  MD,  DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Washington DC-Silver Spring is conveniently situated near a vibrant entertainment district,  the Metro Red Line commuter rail,  and Interstate 495/Capital Beltway. Walk to more than 40 vibrant restaurants,  shops and entertainment venues,  or ride the Metro commuter train - only 2 blocks away - to Washington DC. Discover Silver Spring's pedestrian-friendly downtown,  nearby Bethesda and Washington DC attractions. Our hotel within 45 minutes of Washington National Airport,  Baltimore/Washington International Airport and Washington Dulles International Airport.

Enjoy a comfortable stay in a modern guest room or suite decorated in rich,  warm tones that feature work desks and natural stone bathrooms. Upgrade to a suite for a deluxe private room,  living area,  and walk-in closet.
